name: Verify GET request to retrieve single batch data with invalid batch Name

steps.name: Given  User creates request for Batch module with valid base URL and invalid batch name
When  User sends GET request with invalid batch Name from "batchesGet" and 1
Then  Request should be unsuccessfull with status code "404" for GET batch invalid Name
